        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> getActualVotes()

        Get the number of votes each miner actually has.

        Returns:

        Returns a reward for a miner from a specified block.

        Parameters:
        blockNum - block number
        Returns:
        amount of generated DCT

      • getFeedsByMiner

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> getFeedsByMiner(ChainObject account,
                                                           int count)

        Get a list of published price feeds by a miner.

        Parameters:
        account - account object id, 1.2.*
        count - maximum number of price feeds to fetch (must not exceed 100)
        Returns:
        a list of price feeds published by the miner

      • getMinerByAccount

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.Miner> getMinerByAccount(ChainObject account)

        Get the miner owned by a given account.

        Parameters:
        account - the account object id, 1.2.*, whose miner should be retrieved
        Returns:
        the miner object, or exception ObjectNotFoundException if the account does not have a miner

        Returns map of the first 1000 miners by their name to miner account

        Returns:

        lookup names and IDs for registered miners

        Parameters:
        lowerBound - lower bound of the first name
        limit - max 1000
        Returns:

      • findVotedMiners

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> findVotedMiners(java.util.List<ch.decent.sdk.model.VoteId> voteIds)

        Given a set of votes, return the objects they are voting for. The results will be in the same order as the votes. null will be returned for any vote ids that are not found.

        Parameters:
        voteIds - set of votes
        Returns:
        a list of miners

      • findAllVotingInfo

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> findAllVotingInfo(java.lang.String searchTerm,
                                                             SearchMinerVotingOrder order,
                                                             ChainObject id,
                                                             java.lang.String accountName,
                                                             boolean onlyMyVotes,
                                                             int limit)

        Get miner voting info list by account that match search term.

        Parameters:
        searchTerm - miner name
        order - available options are defined in enum SearchMinerVotingOrder
        id - the object id of the miner to start searching from, 1.4.* or null when start from beginning
        accountName - account name or null when searching without account
        onlyMyVotes - when true it selects only votes given by account
        limit - maximum number of miners info to fetch (must not exceed 1000)
        Returns:
        a list of miner voting info

      • createVoteOperation

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.AccountUpdateOperation> createVoteOperation(ChainObject accountId,
                                                                                                     java.util.List<ch.decent.sdk.model.ChainObject> minerIds,
                                                                                                     Fee fee)

        Create vote for miner operation.

        Parameters:
        accountId - account object id, 1.2.*
        minerIds - list of miner account ids
        fee - {@link AssetAmount} fee for the operation or asset id, if left undefined the fee will be computed in DCT asset. When set, the request might fail if the asset is not convertible to DCT or conversion pool is not large enough
        Returns:
        a transaction confirmation

      • vote

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.TransactionConfirmation> vote(Credentials credentials,
                                                                             java.util.List<ch.decent.sdk.model.ChainObject> minerIds,
                                                                             Fee fee)

        Vote for miner.

        Parameters:
        credentials - account credentials
        minerIds - list of miner account ids
        fee - {@link AssetAmount} fee for the operation or asset id, if left undefined the fee will be computed in DCT asset. When set, the request might fail if the asset is not convertible to DCT or conversion pool is not large enough
        Returns:
        a transaction confirmation
